name: draft-queue-discord-bot
description: Organizes draft queues in a Discord server

scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run buildNoLint
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run executeTestWindows
scripts.testNoLint: npm run buildNoLint && npm run executeTestWindows
scripts.executeTestWindows: SET TS_NODE_PROJECT=test/tsconfig.json&& mocha -P test --colors -r ts-node/register test/**/*.spec.ts
scripts.testUnix: npm run build && npm run executeTestUnix
scripts.executeTestUnix: TS_NODE_PROJECT='test/tsconfig.json' mocha -P test --colors -r ts-node/register test/**/*.spec.ts test/*.spec.ts
